description: A web server for the point-and-click, user-friendly analysis of spatial transcriptomic data. The spatialGE web app supports the functionality of the spatialGE R package, as well as other community-developed tools (e.g., SpaGCN, STdeconvolve, InSituType). The application can analyze Space Ranger Visium and CosMx outputs. It can also analyze data in tabular format (expression data + spatial coordinates).
name: spatialGE (web application)
